column4: Question: what can you do if a fresh install of Interpid crashes everytime during the partitioning of the disk on an Asus X71Sr Laptop. At that moment the CapsLock key starts blinking
hardy used to function but doesnt support the soundplugs
try to install an older version of ubuntu, if it works, do an upgrade from there.
no, I forgot: "fill a bug report" ;)
